tvdb: On the night before her wedding, Alison writes a letter to her future child describing her relationship with Rafe while remembering (via flashbacks) the ups and downs of their relationship. Stephen imagines a future with Livvie where he doesn't have to hide his true identity as Caleb and she willingly chooses to be his bride and drink from him. Elizabeth brings Stephen back to reality and he decides to lose himself in her. Livvie explains to Tess her love for Caleb. Tess cautions her that Caleb's evil will destroy her, but while Tess sleeps, Livvie sneaks out and declares she's not afraid of her destiny.
